channel.title: Jeffrey Cleveland - Economic Charts
channel.description: High-resolution economic charts and data visualizations by Jeffrey Cleveland

item.title: Private Payrolls: How Rare Is "Weak" Right Now?
item.description: An exploration of the current 3-month moving average of monthly private job growth in the historical context.

item.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm: 2025 Was The Weakest Non-Recession Job Growth Year Since 2002
item.description: Putting annual job growth in perspective compared to non-recession years since 1940.

item.title: Housing Inflation's Three Acts: From GFC Dump, To Covid Jump, To 2026 Slump?
item.description: A look at the housing component of core PCE inflation through three acts in the last 20 years.

item.title: DRAM-flation: When Memory Becomes a Macro Variable
item.description: A look at memory device prices as a symptom of the ongoing AI datacenter boom.

item.title: Seasonally-Adjusted Sunset: Shortest Days vs Earliest Sunset
item.description: Settling an annual argument with a friend about whether the shortest day (daylight duration) corresponds with the earliest sunset (sunset time).

item.title: Monetary Groupthink: The Cozy Consensus of A Unanimous FOMC Meeting
item.description: I argue that monetary groupthink might be more worrisome than disagreement.

item.title: Infrastructure Overbuild? The British Railway Bubble of the 1840s
item.description: A depiction of British railway investment as a share of total investment, 1830-1860.

item.title: California Dreaming? Homebuilding Slumped 20 Years Ago and Never Recovered
item.description: Analysis of California's single-family building permits per capita compared to 1990s levels.

item.title: Rare Air: A Cluster of Negative Payroll Prints
item.description: A look at the rare occurrence of negative jobs reports and how they cluster around economic downturns.

item.title: Initial Claims For Unemployment (Layoffs)
item.description: Analysis of non-seasonally adjusted layoffs data

item.title: Q1 U.S. Real GDP versus Real PDFP
item.description: Analysis of Q1 U.S. GDP growth

item.title: Single Family Housing Units (2025)
item.description: Analysis of the supply of single-family units for sale in the U.S. market.
